primary.definition: A book containing practical information or instructions
primary.example: I bought a handbook to learn Afrikaans.

secondary.definition: ‘n Boek met praktiese inligting of instruksies
secondary.example: Ek het 'n handboek gekoop om Afrikaans te leer.

primary.definition: A greeting expressing pleasure at someone's arrival

secondary.definition: ‘n Groet wat blydskap oor iemand se aankoms uitdruk
‘n Uitdrukking van waardering of dankbaarheid

primary.definition: A transparent liquid essential for life
primary.example: I drink a glass of water every morning.

secondary.definition: ‘n Deursigtige vloeistof wat nodig is vir lewe
secondary.example: Ek drink elke oggend ‘n glas water.

primary.definition: A collection of written or printed pages
primary.example: She enjoys reading a book before bedtime.

secondary.definition: ‘n Versameling geskrewe of gedrukte bladsye
secondary.example: Sy lees graag 'n boek voor slaaptyd.

primary.definition: People with whom you have a close relationship
primary.example: I'm going to the movies with my friends.

secondary.definition: Mense met wie jy ‘n hegte verhouding het
secondary.example: Ek gaan saam met my vriende fliek toe.

primary.example: They are building a new house in town.

secondary.definition: ‘n Plek waar mense woon
secondary.example: Hulle bou ‘n nuwe huis in die dorp.

primary.definition: An institution where children are educated
primary.example: Children go to school in the morning.

secondary.definition: ‘n Instansie waar kinders leer

primary.definition: A measurable period in which things happen
primary.example: I don't have enough time to do everything.

secondary.definition: ‘n Meetbare periode waarin dinge gebeur
secondary.example: Ek het nie genoeg tyd om alles te doen nie.

primary.definition: Something people eat to gain energy
primary.example: The food at the restaurant was delicious.

secondary.definition: Iets wat mense eet om energie te kry
secondary.example: Die kos by die restaurant was heerlik.

primary.definition: An activity involving effort, often for income
primary.example: He goes to work every day.

secondary.definition: ‘n Aktiwiteit wat moeite verg en dikwels ‘n inkomste bied
secondary.example: Hy gaan elke dag werk toe.

primary.definition: A young person who is not yet an adult
primary.example: The child is playing outside in the garden.

secondary.definition: ‘n Jong persoon wat nog nie volwassen is nie
secondary.example: Die kind speel buite in die tuin.

primary.definition: To respond with joy and sound to something funny
primary.example: We laughed hard at the joke.

secondary.definition: Om met blydskap en klank te reageer op iets snaaks
secondary.example: Ons het hard gelag vir die grap.

primary.definition: Describes someone who puts in a lot of effort

secondary.definition: Beskryf iemand wat baie moeite doen

primary.definition: When you have no more energy
primary.example: I'm tired after a long day.

secondary.definition: Wanneer jy nie meer energie het nie
secondary.example: Ek is moeg na ‘n lang dag.

primary.definition: To understand words on paper or a screen
primary.example: I read a few pages every night.

secondary.definition: Om woorde op papier of ‘n skerm te verstaan
secondary.example: Ek lees elke aand ‘n paar bladsye.

primary.example: I'm writing a letter to my grandmother.

secondary.definition: Om gedagtes met woorde neer te pen
secondary.example: Ek skryf ‘n brief aan my ouma.

primary.definition: A film shown in a theater

secondary.definition: ‘n Rolprent wat in ‘n teater vertoon word
Die huidige dag
Die dag voor vandag

primary.example: We're going to the beach tomorrow.

secondary.definition: Die dag ná vandag
Met ‘n groot lengte of duur
Met ‘n klein lengte of duur
Met ‘n hoë temperatuur
Met ‘n lae temperatuur
Vry van vuil of gemors

primary.example: My shoes are dirty from the mud.

secondary.definition: Nie skoon nie
secondary.example: My skoene is vuil van die modder.

secondary.definition: Om iets met woorde uit te druk

primary.example: I help my mom with the dishes.

secondary.definition: Om iemand by te staan met iets
secondary.example: Ek help my ma met die skottelgoed.

secondary.definition: Om visueel waar te neem

primary.example: I walk in the park every morning.

secondary.definition: Om te beweeg deur jou voete te gebruik
secondary.example: Ek loop elke oggend in die park.

primary.definition: To move quickly on your feet
primary.example: He runs faster than I do.

secondary.definition: Om vinnig te beweeg op jou voete

primary.example: I ride my bike to school every day.

secondary.definition: ‘n Voertuig met twee wiele
secondary.example: Ek ry elke dag fiets skool toe.

primary.example: We drive to the shops by car.

secondary.definition: ‘n Voertuig wat mense vervoer
secondary.example: Ons ry met die motor na die winkels.

primary.definition: A place where you buy things
primary.example: I buy bread at the shop.

secondary.definition: ‘n Plek waar jy goed koop
secondary.example: Ek koop brood by die winkel.

primary.definition: What you use to buy things
primary.example: I don't have enough money for the ticket.

secondary.definition: Wat jy gebruik om dinge te koop
secondary.example: Ek het nie genoeg geld vir die kaartjie nie.

primary.definition: What you wear to cover your body
primary.example: She buys new clothes for winter.

secondary.definition: Wat jy dra om jou lyf te bedek
secondary.example: Sy koop nuwe klere vir die winter.

primary.definition: Sounds and rhythm that people enjoy

secondary.definition: Klanke en ritme wat mense geniet

primary.definition: Move your body to the rhythm of music

secondary.definition: Beweeg jou lyf op die maat van musiek

primary.definition: To make music with your voice

secondary.definition: Om musiek met jou stem te maak

primary.definition: A visual property like red, blue or yellow

secondary.definition: ‘n Visuele eienskap soos rooi, blou of geel

primary.definition: To take part in an activity for fun
primary.example: The children are playing in the garden.

secondary.definition: Om deel te neem aan 'n aktiwiteit vir pret
secondary.example: Die kinders speel in die tuin.

primary.example: We speak on the phone every day.

secondary.definition: Om woorde te gebruik om te kommunikeer
secondary.example: Ons praat elke dag aan die telefoon.

primary.definition: To pay attention to what you hear

secondary.definition: Om aandag te gee aan wat jy hoor

primary.definition: To be in a state of rest
primary.example: I sleep eight hours every night.

secondary.definition: Om in 'n toestand van rus te wees
secondary.example: Ek slaap elke nag agt uur.

primary.example: We eat together at the table.

secondary.definition: Om voedsel in te neem
secondary.example: Ons eet saam by die tafel.

primary.example: I drink water when I'm thirsty.

secondary.definition: Om vloeistof in te neem
secondary.example: Ek drink water as ek dors is.

primary.definition: To learn for an exam or gain knowledge
primary.example: He studies every evening for his exam.

secondary.definition: Om te leer vir 'n eksamen of om kennis op te doen
secondary.example: Hy studieer elke aand vir sy eksamen.

primary.definition: To comprehend or know what something means
primary.example: I don't understand what you're saying.

secondary.definition: Om iets te begryp of te weet wat iets beteken
secondary.example: Ek verstaan nie wat jy sê nie.

primary.definition: To have thoughts or consider something

secondary.definition: Om gedagtes te hê of te oorweeg

primary.example: I don't know where he is.

secondary.definition: Om kennis of inligting te hê
secondary.example: Ek weet nie waar hy is nie.

secondary.definition: Om emosie of sensasie te ervaar

primary.definition: To enjoy or love something or someone

secondary.definition: Om iets of iemand te geniet of lief te hê

primary.definition: To desire or wish for something
primary.example: I want to buy a new car.

secondary.definition: Om iets te begeer of te wens

primary.definition: To have the ability to do something

secondary.definition: Om die vermoë te hê om iets te doen

primary.definition: To be obliged to do something

secondary.definition: Om verplig te wees om iets te doen

primary.definition: To move from one place to another
primary.example: We're going to the beach tomorrow.

secondary.definition: Om van een plek na 'n ander te beweeg

primary.example: Come here, I want to show you something.

secondary.definition: Om na 'n plek te beweeg
secondary.example: Kom hier, ek wil jou iets wys.

primary.definition: To rest your body on a chair or couch

secondary.definition: Om jou liggaam te laat rus op 'n stoel of bank
secondary.example: Sit asseblief, ek sal koffie maak.

primary.example: Stand up and dance with us.

secondary.definition: Om op jou voete te wees
secondary.example: Staan op en dans saam met ons.

primary.definition: To pick up or raise something

secondary.definition: Om iets op te tel of te verhoog

primary.example: I'll carry the bag for you.

secondary.definition: Om iets te vat en te beweeg
secondary.example: Ek dra die tassie vir jou.

primary.definition: To take something to a place

secondary.definition: Om iets na 'n plek te neem
Om iets te vat of te gebruik
Om iets aan iemand te oorhandig
Om iets te ontdek of te kry
secondary.example: Ek kan my sleutels nie vind nie.

secondary.definition: Om te probeer om iets te vind

primary.definition: To no longer know where something is

secondary.definition: Om nie meer te weet waar iets is nie
Om iets te ontvang of te verkry
Om iets te skep of te vervaardig
Om 'n aksie uit te voer
Om met iets te start
secondary.example: Ons begin môre met die projek.

secondary.definition: Om iets te voltooi of te stop
Om iets anders te maak

primary.example: I want to ask you something.

secondary.definition: Om inligting of iets te begeer
Om te reageer op 'n vraag

primary.example: Show me how to do it.

secondary.definition: Om iets aan iemand te demonstreer
secondary.example: Wys my hoe om dit te doen.

secondary.definition: Om kennis of vaardighede op te doen
Om iemand te help om te leer
Om iets te konstruksieer
Om iets in stukke te maak

primary.definition: To fix something that is broken
primary.example: He repairs cars for a living.

secondary.definition: Om iets wat gebreek is te herstel

primary.example: I wash my hands before eating.

secondary.definition: Om iets skoon te maak met water
secondary.example: Ek was my hande voor ete.

secondary.definition: Om water van iets te verwyder

primary.example: She cooks for the family every evening.

secondary.definition: Om voedsel te berei met hitte
secondary.example: Sy kook elke aand vir die gesin.

primary.definition: To prepare food in an oven
primary.example: I'm baking a cake for the party.

secondary.definition: Om voedsel in 'n oond te berei
secondary.example: Ek bak 'n koek vir die partytjie.

primary.definition: To grill meat on a fire

secondary.definition: Om vleis op 'n vuur te braai

primary.example: I drive to work every day.

secondary.definition: Om 'n voertuig te bestuur
secondary.example: Ek ry elke dag werk toe.

primary.definition: To stop and leave a vehicle
primary.example: Park the car in the garage.

secondary.definition: Om 'n voertuig te stop en te laat staan
secondary.example: Parkeer die kar in die garage.

primary.example: The birds are flying in the sky.

secondary.definition: Om deur die lug te beweeg
secondary.example: Die voëls vlieg in die lug.

primary.example: The children are swimming in the pool.

secondary.definition: Om in water te beweeg
secondary.example: Die kinders swem in die swembad.

primary.definition: To move up and come down again
primary.example: The frogs are jumping into the water.

secondary.definition: Om op te beweeg en weer af te kom
secondary.example: Die kikkers spring in die water.

secondary.definition: Om met jou oë waar te neem
Om met jou neus waar te neem
Om met jou tong waar te neem
Om met jou hande aan te raak
secondary.example: Raak nie aan die warm stoof nie.

secondary.definition: Om met jou ore waar te neem

primary.definition: To share a story or information

secondary.definition: Om 'n storie of inligting te deel

primary.example: The baby is crying because he's hungry.

secondary.definition: Om trane te laat wanneer jy hartseer is
secondary.example: Die baba huil omdat hy honger is.

primary.definition: To move your mouth to show happiness

secondary.definition: Om jou mond te beweeg om blydskap te wys

primary.definition: To close one eye as a sign
primary.example: He winks at me across the room.

secondary.definition: Om een oog te sluit as 'n teken
secondary.example: Hy wenk vir my oor die kamer.

secondary.definition: Om iemand te begroet

primary.definition: To move your hand to say hello or goodbye

secondary.definition: Om jou hand te beweeg om hallo of totsiens te sê

primary.definition: To hold someone tightly in your arms
primary.example: He gave his mother a big hug.

secondary.definition: Om iemand styf in jou arms vas te hou
secondary.example: Hy gee sy ma 'n groot drukkie.
